heading: Tuesday Night
text: Partly cloudy in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys. Mostly cloudy elsewhere, with the slight chance of a sprinkle.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Chance of a mountain sprinkle.
temperature: Upper 40s to mid 50s; mid to upper 50s southeast, and broad valleys west

heading: Thursday
temperature: Mid 40s to around  50s; low to mid 50s southeast, and broad valleys west

heading: Friday
temperature: Upper 40s to mid 50s; mid to upper 50s southeast, and broad valleys west
